name: Island Hero
description:
ISLAND HERO

Using Z, X, C and V, the aim of the game is to play the correct notes when instructed to do so. It's like Guitar Hero but with panpipes.

I thought about incorporating a score but I think the game works well without and it's hoped that people with enjoy the experience rather than get distracted by the competitive element.

Inspiration came from this game that I stumbled on the other day.

Web: www.rustyrocket.co.uk

Twitter: @RocketJez
